summary: Scorecard app: add a new selectable game/scorecard (“Generic Game” / “Generic Scorecard”) based on Nerts-style scoring (numeric entry per player per round, auto-updating totals, unlimited rounds) using the existing player-selection approach.
architectural_notes: Implement a reusable Nerts-style scorecard template: per-player numeric entry per round, auto-tally totals, unlimited rounds; new game can be created by duplicating this template and renaming.
known_issues: Builder/domain slug validation error encountered: name must be 5–50 characters and only letters, numbers, and hyphens (affected "add-new-selectable-game-type:-generic-scorecard-(").

existing_features.title: Add a new selectable game template named "Generic Game" that follows the previously described Nerts-style behavior template: one numeric score entry per player per round, totals automatically computed from entered round scores, and unlimited rounds (no win target / no automatic game end).

Frontend: update template/type plumbing to include the new Generic Game across the app (gameTemplates, route param usage, and LocalSession/RoundEntryState typing) so it is treated as a first-class game type like the existing ones.

Frontend: implement a Generic Game round-entry UI component that matches the Nerts-style template behavior but uses a single numeric input per player (one number per player per round). It must validate numeric input for all players before allowing submission and then submit a Map(playerId -> number) for the round.
Frontend: integrate Generic Game into the existing score sheet and round editing flows so users can add rounds and edit past rounds for Generic Game just like other round-based games.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add new selectable game/scorecard (Generic Game/Generic Scorecard) with Nerts-style scoring: per-player numeric entry each round, auto-updating totals, unlimited rounds, and players added via the same player-selection flow as other games.

Backend: extend the Motoko GameType model and session creation flow to support the new "Generic Game" game type so that authenticated sessions can be created and scored (addRound/updateRound) the same way as existing round-based games.

projectName: Add new Generic Game scorecard using Nerts-style numeric round entry
